strategy: Traitor Titan Legions armies have a strategy rating of 3.
initiative: All Traitor Titan formations have an initiative rating of 1+. All other formations have an initiative of 2+.
usage: The following army list allows you to field an army from the Traitor Titan Legions with Dark Mechanicus support.

sections.name: Traitor Titan Legion Battle Titan Formations
sections.description: A TTL army must contain at least one Chaos Emperor or Chaos Warlord Titan. May not Mix Nurgle/Tzeench or Slaanesh/Khorne formations.

formations.name: 0-1 Chaos Emperor Titan
formations.units: One Vicebringer Titan of Slaanesh / Gloombringer Titan of Nurgle / Strifebringer Titan of Khorne / Changebringer Titan of Tzeench

formations.name: Chaos Warlord Titan
formations.units: One Painlord Titan of Slaanesh / Plaguelord Titan of Nurgle / Banelord Titan of Khorne / Warplord Titan of Tzeench

formations.name: Chaos Reaver Titan
formations.units: One Reviler Titan of Slaanesh / Repugnant Titan of Nurgle / Ravager Titan of Khorne / Mutator Titan of Tzeench

sections.name: Scout Titan Formations
sections.description: Three for each Chaos Emperor Titan, two for each Chaos Warlord Titan. May not Mix Nurgle/Tzeench or Slaanesh/Khorne formations.

formations.name: Chaos Warhounds
formations.units: One Plaguehound of Nurgle / Bloodhound of Khorne / Warphound or Tzeench
upgrades: Add one Chaos Warhound of the chosen type: 225 points

sections.name: Dark Mechanicus Daemon Engine Formations
sections.description: Three for each Battle Titan, one for each unit in a Scout Titan formation. May not Mix Nurgle/Tzeench or Slaanesh/Khorne formations.

formations.name: Hell-Striders of Slaanesh
upgrades: Add up to two Hell-Striders for 35 points each

formations.name: Nurgle Defiler Pack
upgrades: Add up to three Desecrators for 50 points each

formations.name: Khorne Defiler Pack
upgrades: Add up to three Slaughterfiends for 35 points each

formations.name: Chaos Undivided Defiler Pack
upgrades: Add up to two Defilers for 50 points each

sections.name: Chaos Squats and Chaos Navy
sections.description: Up to a fourth of the points available may be spent on these formations

formations.name: Chaos Squats (Chaos Undivided)
formations.units: One Heretek, four Chaos Squat Excavators, two Hades Land Raiders

sections.name: Daemon Pool
sections.description: Any amount may be spent on Daemon Pool points

formations.name: Lesser Daemon Pool
formations.units: Any amount of Lesser Daemon Pool points

upgrades.title: Traitor Titan Legion Upgrades
upgrades.description: Each upgrade may be taken once per formation

items.name: 1 Supreme Commander
items.description: One Eye of the Gods character. Must be added to a Chaos Emperor Titan if such have been bought, or to a Chaos Warlord Titan.
